author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LORENZO WEAKENS OVER THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC...
summary: ...LORENZO WEAKENS OVER THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 AM AST Tue Oct 14 the center of Lorenzo was located near 18.2, -44.9 with movement NW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...LORENZO WEAKENS OVER THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 AM AST Tue Oct 14 the center of Lorenzo was located near 18.2, -44.9 with movement NW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Lorenzo (AT2/AL122025)
